Researcher at [University of Tartu](https://ut.ee/en), [Macroecology workgroup](https://macroecology.ut.ee/en/). <br> My research focus on understanding how ecological communities are assembled across space and time, and how global change drivers (e.g. climate and land-use change) affect such a process.
